doctor.name: Professor Dr. Md. Abdul Latif
doctor.info: Professor Dr. Md. Abdul Latif is a highly experienced medicine specialist with an MBBS and FCPS in Medicine. As a former Professor in the Department of Medicine at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital, he has extensive expertise in diagnosing and treating a wide range of medical conditions, including diabetes, hypertension, heart disease, respiratory infections, arthritis, gastrointestinal disorders, and chronic illnesses. He provides consultations at Sun Medical Services in Comilla, located at 1217 (East Side of Flyover), Race Course, Comilla. Patients can visit him from 9 AM to 7 PM, except on Fridays. His dedication to patient care makes him a trusted name in internal medicine in Comilla.
